txt.en: You should defeat enemies, recover the stolen supplies, and untie rafts in the ruins of Esgaroth.
You should talk to Thorlind, who can be found just outside of Esgaroth-of-old.
Find and defeat those who lead the thieves ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Good work, [placeholder]. With the Men on the run, there is only one worry that remains....'

'This is a time to act, not ponder. Whatever their goal, we should put an end to it. We shall learn what we can after.\n\n'Quickly, let us reclaim Loeglond's missing supplies, sink their rafts, and disperse these Men.'
Thorlind has seen enough and decided that the Men attempting to dredge up Smaug's bones must be stopped.
